protocol.description:
This protocol allows clients to request that the compositor animate a resize transition to a target size. The compositor will send intermediate configure events to the client for smooth animation.
This is useful for side panels, embedded viewers, and other UI elements that need smooth resize transitions.

interface.name: zcosmic_animated_resize_manager_v1
interface.description: This interface allows clients to create animated resize controllers for their toplevel surfaces.

request.name: get_animated_resize

description.summary: get animated resize controller for a surface

request.description: Create an animated resize controller for the given wl_surface. The surface must be the root surface of an xdg_toplevel.

interface.name: zcosmic_animated_resize_v1
interface.description: This interface allows clients to request animated resize transitions. The compositor will animate the window from its current size to the target size by sending intermediate configure events.

request.name: resize_to

description.summary: request animated resize to target size

request.description:
Request the compositor to animate a resize from the current window size to the specified target size. The compositor will send intermediate xdg_toplevel.configure events with sizes along the animation path.
The client should render at each intermediate size for smooth animation. When the animation completes, a 'done' event is sent.
If width or height is 0, that dimension will not be changed.

request.name: resize_to_with_position

description.summary: request animated resize with target position

request.description:
Request the compositor to animate a resize from the current window geometry to the specified target size and position. The compositor will animate both size and position smoothly.
The client should render at each intermediate size for smooth animation. When the animation completes, a 'done' event is sent.
If width or height is 0, that dimension will not be changed. The x and y coordinates specify the target window position in output-local coordinates.
If the window is maximized/fullscreen, the position will be stored and used when the window is restored to normal state.

arg.name: x
arg.summary: target x position in logical pixels

arg.name: y
arg.summary: target y position in logical pixels

event.name: done
event.description: Sent when the animated resize has completed and the window has reached its target size.

event.name: cancelled
event.description: Sent if the animation was cancelled (e.g., user manually resized the window during animation, or another resize_to was requested).
